item.title: Blog
item.description: Discover our latest AI breakthroughs, projects, and updates.

item.title: AlphaGenome: AI for better understanding the genome
item.description: Introducing a new, unifying DNA sequence model that advances regulatory variant-effect prediction and promises to shed new light on genome function — now available via API.

item.title: A catalogue of genetic mutations to help pinpoint the cause of diseases
item.description: New AI tool classifies the effects of 71 million ‘missense’ mutations Uncovering the root causes of disease is one of the greatest challenges in human genetics. With millions of possible...

item.title: AlphaProteo generates novel proteins for biology and health research
item.description: New AI system designs proteins that successfully bind to target molecules, with potential for advancing drug design, disease understanding and more.

item.title: AlphaEvolve: A Gemini-powered coding agent for designing advanced algorithms
item.description: New AI agent evolves algorithms for math and practical applications in computing by combining the creativity of large language models with automated evaluators

item.title: AI achieves silver-medal standard solving International Mathematical Olympiad problems
item.description: Breakthrough models AlphaProof and AlphaGeometry 2 solve advanced reasoning problems in mathematics

item.title: Millions of new materials discovered with deep learning
item.description: We share the discovery of 2.2 million new crystals – equivalent to nearly 800 years’ worth of knowledge. We introduce Graph Networks for Materials Exploration (GNoME), our new deep learning tool...

item.title: Accelerating fusion science through learned plasma control
item.description: Successfully controlling the nuclear fusion plasma in a tokamak with deep reinforcement learning

item.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
item.description: AlphaQubit is an AI-based decoder that identifies quantum computing errors with state-of-the-art accuracy.

item.title: Genie 3: A New Frontier for World Models
item.description: Today we are announcing Genie 3, a general purpose world model that can generate an unprecedented diversity of interactive environments. Given a text prompt, Genie 3 can generate dynamic worlds...

item.title: Claude Opus 4.1
item.description: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.

item.title: Anthropic raises $13B Series F at $183B post-money valuation
item.description: Anthropic has completed a Series F fundraising of $13 billion led by ICONIQ. This financing values Anthropic at $183 billion post-money. Along with ICONIQ, the round was co-led by Fidelity Management & Research Company and Lightspeed Venture Partners. The investment reflects Anthropic’s continued momentum and reinforces our position as the leading intelligence platform for enterprises, developers, and power users.

item.title: Thoughts on America’s AI Action Plan
item.description: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.

item.title: Claude for Financial Services
item.description: Today, we're introducing a comprehensive solution for financial analysis that transforms how finance professionals analyze markets, conduct research, and make investment decisions with Claude.

item.title: Strengthening our safeguards through collaboration with US CAISI and UK AISI
item.description: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.

item.title: Claude introduces memory for teams at work
item.description: Claude now remembers your team's projects and preferences across conversations. Memory helps maintain context for complex work, with project-specific boundaries and full user control over what's remembered.

item.title: NVIDIA Unveils Rubin CPX: A New Class of GPU Designed for Massive-Context Inference
item.description: NVIDIA® today announced NVIDIA Rubin CPX, a new class of GPU purpose-built for massive-context processing. This enables AI systems to handle million-token software coding and generative video with groundbreaking speed and efficiency.

item.title: NVIDIA Announces Financial Results for Second Quarter Fiscal 2026
item.description: NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) today reported revenue for the second quarter ended July 27, 2025, of $46.7 billion, up 6% from the previous quarter and up 56% from a year ago. NVIDIA’s Blackwell Data Center revenue grew 17% sequentially.

item.title: Industry Leaders Transform Enterprise Data Centers for the AI Era With NVIDIA RTX PRO Servers
item.description: NVIDIA today announced leading global enterprises have adopted NVIDIA RTX PRO™ Servers — a new category of enterprise data center infrastructure powered by the RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Server Edition GPU — speeding the shift from general-purpose computing clusters to AI factory infrastructure, without a complete data center overhaul.

item.title: NVIDIA Partners With AI Infrastructure Ecosystem to Unveil Reference Design for Giga-Scale AI Factories
item.description: At this week’s AI Infrastructure Summit in Silicon Valley, NVIDIA’s VP of Accelerated Computing Ian Buck unveiled a bold new vision: the transformation of traditional data centers into fully integrated AI factories. As part of this initiative, NVIDIA is developing reference designs to be shared with partners and enterprises worldwide — offering an NVIDIA Omniverse Read Article
